explanation: [0-0] A woman wearing a headscarf and a white top is standing outside a room, holding a mobile phone in her right hand and placing her index finger on her lips, gesturing to be quiet. The phone screen displays a photo of a girl in a red top and red headscarf. The wall behind the woman is tiled with red and white tiles.

[0-5] The woman turns and holds the phone screen to the peephole of a wooden door on the left. The scene then cuts to four men sitting on a gray sofa. A television is hanging on the wall behind them. The floor is covered with yellow patterned tiles and a white patterned rug. On the left, a boy in a black shirt is reading a book in his hand. The second boy, wearing a green top and gray pants, is looking down at his book. The third boy, in a red hoodie and jeans, is also looking down at his book. The fourth man, wearing a white top and jeans, is looking at his phone. The man seems to hear something and looks up to the left. He then waves his hand, gesturing to the boy on the left to go check it out. The third boy impatiently puts down his book and pats the second boy on the shoulder, asking him to go. The second boy looks at the boy in red and turns his head with a smile, patting the first boy to go. Having no choice, the first boy angrily puts down his book on the left, gets up, and walks to the left.

[5-13] The scene then shows a door. The boy walks towards the door and jumps up to look through the peephole, but he can't see anything. He spreads his hands and walks to the left.
